articles.author: Manjiri Chitre
articles.title: ‘Nipah virus mortality rate very high than Covid-19’: ICMR director general - Hindustan Times
articles.description: According to the ICMR DG, India will be procuring 20 more doses of monoclonal antibody from Australia for the treatment of Nipah virus infection. | Latest News India
articles.content: Director general of the Indian Council of Medical Research (ICMR) Rajeev Bahl on Friday said the mortality rate among those infected with the Nipah virus is much higher compared to that of Covid-19 p… [+2820 chars]
